Bash(git commit -m "Resolve merge conflict in README.md")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add advanced analytics, next-gen security modules and fix repository structure

- Added advanced analytics modules for carbon footprint, cost management, predictive maintenance, and productivity analytics
- Added next-gen security features including AI security copilot, biometric authentication, blockchain audit trail, and quantum-safe cryptography
- Removed node_modules from tracking and added proper .gitignore

)")

Bash(git commit -m "Add complete OpenDirectory enterprise UEM platform

- Enterprise services with Active Directory replacement
- Universal MDM for all platforms
- Group Policy management
- Bulk operations and import tools
- Complete web interfaces
- Docker and Kubernetes deployment configurations
- Multi-platform deployment agents
- Comprehensive documentation")

Bash(git commit -m "Add .gitignore for sensitive data protection and update Claude settings

- Comprehensive .gitignore to exclude sensitive files, credentials, and build artifacts
- Updated Claude local settings
- Ensures no private data is accidentally committed to repository")
